importance_sampling module¶

importance_sampling.do_importance_sampling(new_cinv, new_datavector, modelvectors)[source]¶

do importance sampling on ‘samples’ with Gaussian likelihood with covariance ‘new_cov’. We also want to re-use the model predictions for all of the samples, since we’re only interested in modifying the covariance used in our likelihood (or rescaling the model predictions by a constant) or replacing the datavector.
